member.name: IP_MREQ
member.summary: The ip_mreq structure provides multicast group information for IPv4 addresses.

member.name: IP_MREQ.imr_multiaddr
member.summary: The address of the IPv4 multicast group.

summary.para: The local IPv4 address of the interface or the interface index on which the multicast group should be joined or dropped. This value is in network byte order. If this member specifies an IPv4 address of 0.0.0.0, the default IPv4 multicast interface is used.
To use an interface index of 1 would be the same as an IP address of 0.0.0.1.
